name: Junkyard (cement addiction)
description:
That mother FUCKING Abble stole Gopnik Goblin's CHEETOS ™️ again!  You've chased him to the junkyard, and now go and beat his ass and get your CHEETOS ™️ back from that bitch ass mother fucker 

arrow keys move 

use left and right arrow keys in rapid succession to beat the Abble to death with your legs or head

quit the game by quitting the game
